contentrichtext.text: {{enzyme | Name = quinate O-hydroxycinnamoyltransferase | EC_number = 2.3.1.99 | CAS_number = 60321-02-0 | IUBMB_EC_number = 2/3/1/99 | GO_code = 0047205 | image = | width = | caption = }} In [[enzymology]], a '''quinate O-hydroxycinnamoyltransferase''' ({{EC number|2.3.1.99}}) is an [[enzyme]] that [[catalysis|catalyzes]] the [[chemical reaction]] :feruloyl-CoA + quinate <math>\rightleftharpoons</math> CoA + O-feruloylquinate Thus, the two [[substrate (biochemistry)|substrates]] of this enzyme are [[feruloyl-CoA]] and [[quinate]], whereas its two [[product (chemistry)|products]] are [[coenzyme A|CoA]] and [[O-feruloylquinate]]. This enzyme belongs to the family of [[transferase]]s, specifically those [[acyltransferase]]s transferring groups other than aminoacyl groups. The systematic name of this enzyme class is '''feruloyl-CoA:quinate O-(hydroxycinnamoyl)transferase'''. This enzyme is also called '''hydroxycinnamoyl coenzyme A-quinate transferase'''. This enzyme participates in [[phenylpropanoid biosynthesis]]. == References == {{reflist|1}} * {{cite journal | author = Strack D, Gross W, Wray V, Grotjahn L | date = 1987 | title = Enzymic Synthesis of Caffeoylglucaric Acid from Chlorogenic Acid and Glucaric Acid by a Protein Preparation from Tomato Cotyledons | journal = Plant. Physiol. | volume = 83 | pages = 475–478 | pmid = 16665274 | doi = 10.1104/pp.83.3.475 | issue = 3 | pmc = 1056389 }} * {{cite journal | author = Strack D, Keller H and Weissenbock G | date = 1987 | title = Enzymatic-synthesis of hydroxycinnamic acid-esters of sugar acids and hydroaromatic acids by protein preparations from rye (Secale cereale) primary leaves | journal = J. Plant Physiol. | volume = 131 | pages = 61–73 }} * {{cite journal | author = Villegas RJ, Kojima M | date = 1986 | title = Purification and characterization of hydroxycinnamoyl D-glucose Quinate hydroxycinnamoyl transferase in the root of sweet potato, Ipomoea batatas Lam | journal = J. Biol. Chem. | volume = 261 | pages = 8729–33 | pmid = 3722170 | issue = 19 }} [[Category:EC 2.3.1]] [[Category:Enzymes of unknown structure]] [[Category:Hydroxycinnamic acids metabolism]] {{transferase-stub}}
